definitions.definition: A circle of people who associate with one another.
definitions.example: The new junior employee joined our merry after-hours coterie.

definitions.definition: An exclusive group of people, who associate closely for a common purpose.
definitions.example: A tightly knit coterie of executive powerbrokers made all the real decisions in the company.

definitions.definition: A communal burrow of prairie dogs.
definitions.example: The coterie was located in the middle of our wheat field.
